Daniel Johnson

Desktop Environment

Coding Editors

Brief Description

In 2017, I started my journey with web development, enrolling first with Code Academy, then later progressed to udacity for Front-End and Full-stack Developer. These led me to pursue a career in web development because I enjoyed it. I continued to further my ability enrolling in Free Code Camp, which included building an extensive portfolio containing responsive design, Front-end libraries, Back-end, Data visualisation, Javascript Algorithms and APIs and microservices. While taking this course, I grew to enjoy using React JS over other JS frameworks as I built a markdown viewer and a drum machine. After completing the code camp; I started to build a portfolio on Github demonstrating my skills and adaptability.
